title: Four people killed and five injured in shooting at Kansas City bar as police search for suspect
text:
Four people have been killed and five others injured in a shooting at a bar in Kansas City, Kansas, early Sunday morning.

Gunfire erupted at the Tequila KC Bar at 1.27am local time, according to police spokesman Thomas Tomasic.

Officers arrived on the scene and found four people dead inside the bar. Five others were transported to the hospital in stable condition.

It is unclear how many shooters were involved. No suspects have been arrested as of 6am CST.

Four people have been killed and five others injured in a shooting at Tequila KC Bar in Kansas City, Kansas, early Sunday morning. Police are pictured at the scene

'We do not have a good enough description yet, to put anything out for a suspect, or suspects, we don't even know how many,' Tomasic told CNN.

He added that detectives are looking at surveillance video and are investigating the situation 'very slowly and methodically'.

Police evacuated the bar and are reportedly waiting on a search warrant to re-enter it.

Local TV station KSHB reported that handgun shells were found on the scene.

This is a developing story.

It is unclear how many suspects were involved in the shooting. Cops have not made any arrests
description: Gunfire erupted at the Tequila KC Bar in Kansas City, Kansas, at 1.27am local time Sunday. It is unclear how many shooters were involved. No suspects have been arrested as of 6am CST.
